actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain rights in the State of Florida.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to sell all right, title, and interest in oil and minerals reserved to the United States in specified lands in Lake County, Florida.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain rights in the State of Florida.
